text: The Western Block Party (or WBP) was a conservative political party in Canada. It wanted Western Canada to become independent from the rest of Canada. It was founded in 2005. It first ran candidates in the 2006 federal elections. The party's current leader is Paul St. Laurent. The WBP was not affiliated with some other independent parties in western Canada, such as the Alberta First Party and the Western Independence Party of Saskatchewan. == Related pages == * List of political parties in Canada ==References== Category:2005 establishments in Canada Category:2014 disestablishments in Canada Category:Political parties in Canada Category:Organizations based in British Columbia
title: Western Block Party
